PageTitle: display pim ipv6 bfd session statistics
FuncDef: The display pim ipv6 bfd session statistics command displays information statistics about PIM IPv6 BFD sessions. The display pim ipv6 bfd session statistics command displays information statistics about PIM IPv6 BFD sessions. This command is supported only on the CE6863H, CE6863H-K, CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE6855-48XS8CQ, CE6885-SAN, CE8850-SAN, CE8855, CE8851-32CQ4BQ, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P, CE8850-HAM, CE6881H, CE6881H-K, CE6820H, CE6820H-K, CE6820S, CE6885, CE6885-T, CE6885-LL (standard forwarding mode) and CE6863E-48S8CQ.
CLIs: display pim ipv6 bfd session statistics
display pim ipv6 { vpn-instance <instance-name> | all-instance } bfdsession [ neighbor <ipv6-link-local-address> | interface { <interface-name> | <interface-type> <interface-number> } ]
display pim ipv6 { vpn-instance <instance-name> | all-instance } bfdsessionstatistics

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of a VPN instance.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported. In addition, the VPN instance name must not be _public_. When double quotation marks are used around the string, spaces are allowed in the string.

Displays information about PIM IPv6 BFD sessions on a specified neighbor.
The value ranges from FE80:: to FE80:FFFF:FFFF:FFFF:FFFF:FFFF:FFFF:FFFF, in hexadecimal notation.

Displays information about PIM IPv6 BFD sessions on a specified interface.
-

Examples: <HUAWEI> display pim ipv6 bfd session statistics
